Engineering @ Wealthsimple Wealthsimple has several engineering teams ranging from product-focused to back-office and our teams build and manage the software that powers our services. We do this using microservice architecture and an agile approach, focused on short iterations and rigorous automated testing, deploying our code over 100 times a day. We maximize our productivity by building high- performing teams and giving them autonomy to deliver results, working very closely with product management, design and operations to make sure that our work delivers maximum benefit for our clients. ABOUT OUR TEAMS Product Engineering at Wealthsimple drives the development of our core offerings across Investing, Banking, Tiers, and Marketing. This team builds intuitive and impactful features that empower millions to achieve their financial goals within these key areas. Collaborating closely with design and product, they bring innovative ideas to life, directly impacting our users' financial well- being. If you're passionate about crafting user-centric solutions and seeing your work make a real difference, join us. Platform Engineering at Wealthsimple empowers developers by providing the platforms, tools, and infrastructure needed to build and maintain fast, reliable, secure, and scalable systems. This domain includes teams focused on Brokerage Execution, Data Delivery, Data Platform, Design System, and ML Platform. They focus on developer enablement, operational excellence, and performance at scale, ultimately aiming to create a delightful client experience. The team adheres to a "platform-as-a-product" mindset, continuously improving its services based on user feedback and business impact. If you're passionate about building powerful and scalable platforms that enable innovation, join us. The Financial Operating System (FOS) domain offers the fundamental financial building blocks necessary to develop our financial products. Our teams, including Book of Record, and Identity Trust empower our customers with a robust financial platform that delivers real-time insights, ensures impeccable data integrity, and creates trust-building experiences. FOS manages core financial operations, focusing on building a real-time ledger for improved scalability and enabling product teams to innovate.
